uk.ac.ebi.mdk.service.index
Interface LuceneIndex

All Superinterfaces:
ServiceLocation
All Known Implementing Classes:
ChEBICrossReferenceIndex, ChEBIDataIndex, ChEBINameIndex, ChEBIStructureIndex, DefaultNameIndex, HMDBDataIndex, HMDBNameIndex, HMDBStructureIndex, KEGGCompoundDataIndex, KEGGCompoundNameIndex, KEGGCompoundStructureIndex, KeywordNIOIndex, LipidMapsNameIndex, LipidMapsStructureIndex, MetaCycNameIndex, MetaCycStructureIndex, NIOFSIndex, StandardNIOIndex, TaxonomyIndex, UniProtCrossReferenceIndex
public interface LuceneIndex
extends ServiceLocation

LuceneIndex.java - 20.02.2012

Lucene index describes the location of the index as well as the Directory and Analyzer used to create the index. It should indicate whether a) startup() for a service to use and b) getLastUpdate() to inform the user if an update is needed

Version:
$Rev$
Author:
johnmay, $Author$ (this version)
